text: Today, Hillary for America Director of Jewish Outreach, Sarah Bard, released the following statement:"Donald Trump Jr.'s recent comments invoking the use of gas chambers to make a political attack show just how insensitive, divisive, and reckless the Trump campaign is. The bottom line is this В— В offensive references to the Holocaust are never acceptable, especially from a Presidential campaign. This is just the latest string of outrageous comments and offensive actions from the Trump campaign. From imposing a Star of David over a sea of dollar bills in a widely shared graphic, retweeting anti-Semitic white supremacists, to remarks he's made using anti-Semitic stereotypes В— the Trump campaign has shown us exactly the type of campaign they are running time and time again, and this campaign will continue to hold them accountable."
title: Hillary for America Statement on Donald Trump Jr.'s Offensive Comments
